html:
5.30.21  3:27 pm   Why the end of the videos "Christmas isn't real", "You're free to do whatever you want to" and "The dot video" are very surprising?

      my only explanation is that you were expecting something different

5.30.21  12:12 pm   why is the u and q swapped in questions?

      combined with the color scheme, it's part of a strategy for graphics-free title graphics

5.30.21  9:53 am   how should one start experimenting with seemingly endless harmonic language?

      how about doing some things with words, and/or melodies. You could think of yourself like an Emergency Medical Technician, bringing harmony to places and times where it is most desperately needed

5.30.21  9:14 am   What color is shown at 1:23 in the next video?

      none yet

5.30.21  8:12 am   Do you think it's reasonable for Em to substituted for C/E?

      that all depends on how it sounds with the rest of the music

5.30.21  5:14 am   What would you call this chord? low to high on piano: D, G, A, C#, E. Bass guitar mainly plays A (and some C# and D), the melody over it oscillates between C# and D with one E.

     without actually hearing it, from your description it sounds like it's probably A7add4

      For reference, the chord resolves to G6 but the song is in A major. I wrote the chord to fit the melody and IDK what it is but that's just how it turned out.

5.30.21  5:03 am   Which musical instrument is good for the beginners

      probably some type of piano keyboard

5.30.21  4:54 am   do you have any songs with overdubbed vocal harmony?

     yes, certainly all of them since at least 2015. all of my harmony is overdubbed because i haven't yet learned how to sing 2 notes at the same time

      if not, would you consider it for future songs?

5.30.21  3:16 am   what is the meaning of time and humans living?

      this is your opportunity to demonstrate

5.30.21  2:59 am   Does your next song contain the word 'love'

      no

5.30.21  2:02 am   how long does it take you to write a song?

     1 to 3 days

     and how do you come up with such astounding chord progressions and modulations?

     sometimes i must 'flip my lid'

5.30.21  1:08 am   Thoughts about phillipines

      the roads are made of concrete

5.30.21  12:41 am   How is your next song coming along?

      pretty good

5.29.21  11:57 pm   does "i said it three or four songs ago" refer to "at the airport terminal" or "you're free to do whatever you want to"?

      no

5.29.21  11:57 pm   will there be any sort of behind-the-scenes production breakdown?

      yes

5.29.21  10:53 pm   Do you find arpeggios gimmicky?

      limiting. like if you only were allowed to speak in palindromes

5.29.21  9:08 pm   is your new song 3d or 2d?

      neither yet

5.29.21  8:40 pm   On average how long does it take to produce a music video?

      just the right amount of time

5.29.21  8:34 pm   As an unknown musician which tries to make good music to eventually become a little less unknow, I was wondering how do you create such unexpected but cool chords progressions. Does it require a lot of harmonic knowledge? 

     it helps to have a lot of harmonic experience. But, there's more to the story. If you just have a lot of harmonic experience, you're probably going to be thinking about the chords too much. So what you really need is to have a lot of harmonic experience while also having a lot of experience with songs in general, or with life in general. this is what's really going to make everything click togetherattention to the chords

5.29.21  7:32 pm   Do you ever have business meetings? 

      yes

5.29.21  6:44 pm   Does music truly decorate time?

      yes

5.29.21  6:05 pm   why do you time travel from 2019 to 2021?

      we all did. it's impossible not to travel through time

5.29.21  6:02 pm   Why are you blue in the first "game going to" in just did a bad thing

      what can i say. color happens

5.29.21  5:58 pm   go on a indepth rant explaining the word "normal" 

      it's you

5.29.21  4:15 pm   What inspired you to write "you're free to do whatever you want to"?

      if i recall correctly i was on some sort of intensive self inflicted songwriting training program, which now that i think about it, continues to this day

5.29.21  2:34 pm   will you use the sombrero hat again

      yes

5.29.21  1:36 pm   Should we avoid putting reverb on any instrument on the lower part of the frequency spectrum

      i guess it depends on the size of your suitcase

5.29.21  9:56 am   why is a piano floating around in 0:18 in here comes the sun?

     to accompany the sound of a piano that can be heard in the music at that time

      does it have any significance and why was it an upright and not a grand piano

     perhaps a more box shaped piano is more recognizable when spinning. or perhaps it fits with the general 'boxed in' sort of theme developing at that time

5.29.21  6:42 am   when given the option, do you take the elevator or the stairs?

      usually the stairs, unless they are fucked up stairs

5.29.21  4:40 am   do you ever have recurring dreams that you can never remember?

      i'm not sure

5.29.21  2:16 am   Why did you upload the song "might quit"?

     because i finished it, including the video for it

     Comment section says that you've been learning 3D animations.

     i've begun to incorporate 3D into my videos, more since 2020 than i had been before

5.29.21  1:39 am   How much mustard is too much?

      how about a million tonnes

5.29.21  12:37 am   favorite type of bread?

      huge

5.29.21  12:03 am   how to make a good video

      got to praise the lord, of course i'm paraphrasing here somewhat

5.28.21  10:40 pm   do you enjoy making songs?

      yes

5.28.21  10:15 pm   Is your next song cool?

      yes

5.28.21  9:57 pm   Which song are you referring to when you say "cause wednesday seems so long ago (I said it three or four songs ago)"? 

      i was probably referring to an improv, where i sang "it's time for the show"

5.28.21  7:37 pm   Where do you find the inspiration for your songs?

      all over the place

5.28.21  6:21 pm   Is your next song a song?

      let me perform some calculations

5.28.21  6:09 pm   where do you get your ideas from?

      someetimes they are B sides of other ideas

5.28.21  5:52 pm   what do you think of this chord: 1 m3 5 maj7 #11 and do you have a cool name for it?

      B/C mostly

5.28.21  5:27 pm   Do you write the lyrics first or the music first?

     usually not

      Or both?

     usually yes

5.28.21  4:27 pm   do the letters in 'sea' in the money video turn to a's because you're singing an a

      the original line is "going out to sea". then, i discovered a double meaning: "going out to see." So i took the opportunity in the video to display both. and when i showed "see" first and changed it to "sea", it became obvious to continue changing more letters to A, just on sheer momentum. then i also noticed that the word "see" occurs over a huge C in the bass

5.28.21  4:03 pm   how much jazz music theory training have you had?

     i trained myself, so i'm not sure when it's 'training' and when it's ....tripping

     your songs seem to be full of subtle but intricate harmony

      that is thanks to my subtle but intricate personality

5.28.21  1:22 pm   how long does it take to make your music?

      just the right amount of time

5.28.21  11:35 am   Do you think it would be correct to say that you love and hate your creations at the same time?

      no. has to be different times

5.28.21  9:24 am   since you want each song to be better than the last, does that mean that got some money is your favorite song that is on Youube at this very moment?

      it's the most scary. because, as you said, i 'want' each song to be better than the last. That one's done, so i can't change it. so that's exactly when i most have to face my fears about whether or not it actually turned out that way. but as usual in this situation my attention is diverted to the next one i'm working on

5.28.21  5:56 am   how long is a quarter note (in seconds)

      60 divided by the tempo

5.28.21  3:41 am   how do you make your songs catchy?

      you have to strike up an emotional relationship between you and whomever you wish may 'catch' the songs

5.28.21  3:12 am   What's the best way to use the pitch wheel on a keyboard?

      move the wheel with one hand, and play notes with your other hand
